### AFL setup:
```sh
$ mkdir input
$ mkdir output
$ echo 'aaa\n' > input/test.txt
$ ~/AFL/afl-fuzz -Q -i input/ -o output/ ./brackets
```
![afl_screenshot.png](afl_screenshot.png)
